title: Power Mech Projects bags orders worth Rs 2,192.41 cr
description: It also bagged another order for mining of river bed mineral (RBM) located in river bed of Dehradun, Haridwar, Udham singh Nagar and Nainital Districts for Rs 1,517.60 crores.
